original_text: Now the king was attracted to Esther more than to any of the other women, and she won his favor and approval more than any of the other virgins. So he set a royal crown on her head and made her queen instead of Vashti.
korean_text: 왕이 모든 여자보다 에스더를 더 사랑하므로 그가 모든 처녀보다 왕 앞에 더 은총을 얻은지라 왕이 그의 머리에 관을 씌우고 와스디를 대신하여 왕후로 삼은 후에

sentences.original_text: Now the king was attracted to Esther
more than to any of the other women
and approval more than any of the other virgins
sentences.korean_translation: 인정을 다른 모든 처녀들보다 더 받았습니다

sentences.original_text: So he set a royal crown on her head
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 왕관을 그녀의 머리에 씌웠습니다

sentences.original_text: and made her queen instead of Vashti
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 와스디를 대신하여 그녀를 왕후로 삼았습니다
